thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 2 of 630
thread.title: Lis WOng

author: Lis WOng
title: Lis WOng
text:
The website is user friendly and I love how there are recommendations under the item I am looking at, which I can click on and get more ideas. I got hooked on the website for hours every day over the past few days. I can't stop and make a decision on what I truly need as there are so many choices! Also free shipping for purchase over $55 !
This is highly recommended!
